ARABIC: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Ask them for a fatwa: is it they who are stronger in structure or other things We have created? We created them from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So ask them if they are more difficult to create, or the rest We have created? Indeed (man) We created from fermented clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So ask them (that is, human beings): “Were they harder to create than the objects We created?” We created them from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), ask them, "Have they (people) been created stronger than what We have created?" We have created them from moist clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore ask them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Are they a stronger creation, or are other things of our creation, (the angels, the heavens etc.)?” We have indeed created them from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then ask them: "Are they harder to create, or those whom We have created" Verily, We created them of a sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then ask them whether they are stronger in creation or those (others) whom We have created. Surely We created them of firm clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So ask them for a pronouncement -- Are they stronger in constitution, or those We created? We created them of clinging clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then ask them (O Muhammad): Are they stronger as a creation, or those (others) whom we have created? Lo! We created them of plastic clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So, ask those who deny the truth if it was harder to create them than all the other things We have created? We created them from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Ask them thou: are they stronger in structure or those others whom We have created? Verily We! We have created them of a sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Ask them, is their creation more prodigious or [that of other creatures] that We have created? Indeed, We created them from a viscous clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Just ask their opinion: are they the more difficult to create, or the (other) beings We have created? Them have We created out of a sticky clay!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then ask them (i.e. these polytheists, O Muhammad SAW): "Are they stronger as creation, or those (others like the heavens and the earth and the mountains, etc.) whom We have created?" Verily, We created them of a sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So ask them, are they stronger in constitution, or those whom We have created. We have created them of sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Inquire of them, “Are they more difficult to create, or the others We created?” We created them from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:11] So ask them, in other words, inquire of the people of Mecca for affirmation or by way of rebuke: Are they stronger as a creation, or those [others] whom We created?, of angels, heavens, the two earths and all that is in them (the use of man, ‘those whom’ [in man khalaqnā] indicates that the reference is predominantly to [other] rational creatures). Indeed We created them, that is, their origin, Adam, from a viscous clay, that sticks to the hand. The [intended] meaning is that their physical make-up is fragile so let them not behave arrogantly by rejecting the Prophet and the Qur’ān, a fact which will result in their — easily accomplished — destruction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then ask them (0 Muhammad)) ask the people of Mecca: (Are they stronger as a creation) as a resurrected people, (or those (others) whom We have created) of angels and all other people? (Lo! We created them of plastic) sticking (clay) We created them from Adam and Adam is from clay.
